contracts.title: Continue Architecture Support for Execution Teams
contracts.description: Provide architecture guidance for Agent-1 (Case Variations, Trading Repos), Agent-3 (Case Variations, Streamertools), Agent-7 (8 repos integration), Agent-8 (SSOT consolidation). Monitor progress and provide guidance as needed.

contracts.title: Apply Test-Driven Dead Code Removal Pattern
contracts.description: Apply the test-driven dead code removal pattern to other modules. Create comprehensive tests, identify unused functionality, verify usage, remove dead code. Pattern: Create Tests → Identify Gaps → Analyze Usage → Verify Protocol → Remove Dead Code.
deliverables: Test suites created for target modules

contracts.title: Monitor Stage 1 Integration Progress
contracts.description: Monitor Stage 1 integration progress across swarm. Review integration patterns, identify blockers, provide architecture support. Track progress toward 33-36 repo target.
